column4: Can anyone explain to me why chromium will not pin in my Unity toolbar?
run it, then right click and select 'keep in launcher', does that not work?
even when I'm running Chrome (now for instance) it doesn't show up in Unity.
which version are you running?
I have no clue. How might I find out?
apt-cache policy chromium-browser
is it running now? does it show in:  ps -ef | grep chromi
It is running yes.
Several times over. which is odd since I only have one window open
kill them all, then restart a new one afresh
I killed them all, and started a new session. Still not showing up on the toolbar
does it happen as all users?
this is my only user, so i would assume yes.
make a new one to test
got it working. thank you :)
sweet
is it working as the original user, or the new user?
I felt lucky, so I just logged back in as my original user, and it works fine now
started up, i could pin it to the toolbar, and it has an icon (the last time it would stay on the toolbar it was just black where the icon should've been)
sweet, always nice
If you add the daily build ppa you wil get nice beta features ;)
